meanings.def: the amount of money that you pay to use something for a particular period of time
examples: a low hourly rate of pay
The phone bill gives a breakdown of the cost of the line rental and of calls.
the broadband package includes 6 months free line rental
The weekly rental on the car was over £200.

meanings.def: the act of renting something or an arrangement to rent something
examples: the world’s largest car rental company
(especially North American English) a rental car
a minimum rental period of three months
a coupon for a free movie rental
The local rental market is booming.

meanings.def: a house, car or piece of equipment that you can rent
examples: ‘Is this your own car?’ ‘No, it's a rental.’
